Through its official Amazon storefront, REDTIGER is offering its F7NP Front and Rear Dash Cam for $85.48 shipped. Coming down off its $130 full price tag, we saw regular discounts taking the costs down to $90 until July, when that month’s Prime Day event first gave us the first drop to this rate, which has been regularly returning in the months since. While it has gone lower in the past, you’re still getting another shot at this solid 43% markdown that cuts $45 off the tag for one of its lowest prices at Amazon.

more…

Best Buy’s next batch of Black Friday Doorbusters are now live. A we reported previously, Best Buy will be offering up a new batch of Black Friday Doorbusters every Friday of the month and the Week 2 deals are now live. You’ll find them all right here alongside additional details below.

items.title: Amazon one-ups Target with an even better early Black Friday Levi’s sale, up to 50% off
items.summary:
Amazon kicked off an early Black Friday Levi’s sale, offering up to 50% off tons of classic styles for the whole family. This sale is definitely giving Target’s sale a run for its money. You’ll find deals on everything from jeans and chinos to jackets and shirts, available in a wide range of sizes, styles, colors, and even Big & Tall options. Whether you’re restocking your denim or looking to upgrade to a different style, now’s the time to score some classic Levi’s jeans at a fraction of the cost. Shop the full Levi’s sale on Amazon here.

items.title: Nordstrom launches massive early Black Friday sale at up to 70% off with deals from $23
items.summary:
Nordstrom just kicked off their early Black Friday sale with an additional 30% off already marked down items, plus an incredible amount of new markdowns across every category. Sportswear, workwear, and holiday fashion all available now at some of the best prices all year. Check out the massive sale here.

items.title: Stock up while these knit polo-style sweaters are down to $18 each (Reg. $25)
items.summary:
COOFANDY Knit Polo Sweater

Buy for $18 (Reg. $25)

What we love

When cold weather creeps in, a lot of folks just reach for a boring jacket that blends in with the crowd. If you want to shake things up, a sweater can really help. I have personally leaned into this look during colder months and a nice perk is you will be even warmer when you need to put a jacket on top.

items.title: Cash in during Lectric’s Black Friday battery sale with up to 25% off new and legacy models starting from $270
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing early Black Friday Sale, Lectric has now launched a Black Friday battery sale with up to 25% savings across a large collection of spare batteries that you can use to double your range and prolong travel times, with prices starting at $270 shipped and ranging up to $595 shipped. Usually for discounts on extra batteries, you’d have to be lucky to catch some of the rare instances of free inclusions, with occasional models getting up to 30% discounts alongside e-bike purchases, but again, these are rare occurrences. While this side sale continues you’ll be able to grab one for any XP4, XPeak, XPedition, XPress, XP Lite, ONE, and older XP 3.0 e-bikes you already own with up to $211 in savings at some of their best prices. Head below to check out the full lineup while they’re still around.

more…

Normally fetching $170 at full price, with the discounts we’ve seen this year mostly keeping costs above $120, save for some falls to $100 that are beaten by the $96 low from 2024. Today’s deal gives you a 41% markdown for $70 off the going rate, putting it back at the best price we have tracked this year and the second-lowest overall.
